Applicant : Lawrence, Jennifer
School (district) : Bridgewater Elementary (Bonneville Joint District 93)
Role(s) : Special Education Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : I have experience in behavioral intervention. I have worked with families to develop plans for behavioral interventions and worked with professionals to implement those plans. I have also worked directly with children implementing interventions. I am interested in geology and spend some recreational time learning about local geological features. I also enjoy learning about animals and their contributions to our world. 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am very interested in how I can incorporate more STEM activities in my self-contained special education classroom. I hope to utilize children's natural curiosity about the world around them to assist in closing gaps in academic and life skills that my students may have and I believe STEM is a vital component to being successful in that goal.
